meaningMnemonic: You come across a <radical>gold</radical> <radical>hill</radical>. You think you hit it big! You start digging, only to find out that it is merely a paper-thin layer of gold covering a hill of <kanji>steel</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You report your findings about the <kanji>steel</kanji> you found to Emperor <reading>こう</reading>いち. He is displeased that it is a hill of steel.
